metadata.title: CVE-2024-36934 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bna: ensure the copied buf is NUL terminatedCurrently, we allocate a nbytes-sized kernel buffer and copy nbytes fromuserspace to that buffer. Later, we use sscanf on this buffer but we don'tensure that the string is terminated inside the buffer, this can lead toOOB read when using sscanf. Fix this issue by using memdup_user_nulinstead of memdup_user.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
